one_reviews_text: It’s a great, short movie.  Well polished.  And for $1, what do you have to lose?

review_title: A great demonstration of VR cinema
one_reviews_text: For $1, this is a great demonstration of what VR cinema can do. It's short, goofy, and wonderfully translatable, but it's also jammed with things that only VR cinema can do. The dragon at the end does a great job of demonstrating the scale and immedacy that no other form of cinema experience can render. If you're trying to demonstrate quickly to someone why VR matters, this is a great little demo.

I wish there are more of this kind of just-sit-and-watch type of movie, animated or otherwise. Not every likes shooting & killing or even solving puzzles. Just sit back & enjoy the graphics. I like it, though not love.
A short non-interactive movie that you watch from 'within' the movie.  Cute cartoon, G-rated, but watch it before you show young kids, there is a potentially 'scary for kids' part...

review_title: Realy good for 1,- and even if it was 20
